Review_title: It takes juvenile crime to a different level
Review_Text: Songs from the Hole takes juvenile crime to a totally different level, after what Adolescence, the British miniseries, has already done this year.Contessa Gayles did a wonderful job and James "JJ'88" Jacob is here to become a cult, otherwise I don't see the reason we love to be thrilled by fictional dramas on the topic whilst skipping the real deal. More to it, I see such a generous teaching resource in this bio-documentary. Prepare to sing, dance, cry and laugh. Prepare yourself for a thrilling lesson.
